title: इमरान खान का भाषण देख रहा भारतीय मुस्लिम परिवार? नहीं, फोटोशॉप तस्वीर शेयर

vclaim: We have heard Imran Khan’s speech with our entire family in India. It is heartening to hear the words of Islam.@FarhanKVirk@ZaidZamanHamid@CallSignMujahid#ImranKhanVoiceOfKashmirpic.twitter.com/R6hcZ2cwZP
